init.title: IR Remote - Management
init.description:
Choose an action to manage IR controllers and devices.

Current number of controllers: {controllers_count}

data_description.action: Select what you want to do

add_controller.title: Add IR Controller
add_controller.description: Select a ZHA device to use as IR controller and specify the room.

data_description.ieee: Select IR controller from ZHA devices list
data_description.room_name: For example: Living Room, Bedroom, Kitchen
data_description.endpoint_id: Usually 1, change only if you know what you're doing
data_description.cluster_id: Usually 57348, change only if you know what you're doing

select_controller.title: Select IR Controller
select_controller.description: Choose IR controller to add device to.

add_device.title: Add Device
add_device.description: Add a new virtual device to controller "{controller_name}".

data_description.device_name: For example: TV, Audio System, Air Conditioner

select_controller_for_command.title: Select IR Controller
select_controller_for_command.description: Choose IR controller to add command to.

select_device_for_command.title: Select Device
select_device_for_command.description: Choose device to add command to.

add_command.title: Add Command
add_command.description: Add a new command to device "{device_name}" (controller: "{controller_name}").

data_description.command_name: For example: Power On, Power Off, Volume Up, Volume Down

learn_command.title: Learn Command
learn_command.description:
Now learning command "{command_name}" for device "{device_name}".

1. Make sure IR controller "{controller_name}" is pointed at the target device
2. Click "Ready to Learn"
3. Immediately press the desired button on the original remote

The command will be automatically saved after receiving the IR signal.

select_controller_for_remove_device.title: Select IR Controller
select_controller_for_remove_device.description: Choose IR controller to remove device from.

select_device_for_remove.title: Select Device to Remove
select_device_for_remove.description: Choose device to remove from controller "{controller_name}".

confirm_remove_device.title: ⚠️ Confirm Device Removal
confirm_remove_device.description:
You are about to remove device "{device_name}" from controller "{controller_name}".

⚠️ WARNING: ALL commands for this device will be deleted ({commands_count} commands).

This action cannot be undone!

select_controller_for_remove_command.title: Select IR Controller
select_controller_for_remove_command.description: Choose IR controller to remove command from.

select_device_for_remove_command.title: Select Device
select_device_for_remove_command.description: Choose device to remove command from in controller "{controller_name}".

select_command_for_remove.title: Select Command to Remove
select_command_for_remove.description: Choose command to remove from device "{device_name}".

confirm_remove_command.title: ⚠️ Confirm Command Removal
confirm_remove_command.description:
You are about to remove command "{command_name}" from device "{device_name}" (controller: "{controller_name}").

This action cannot be undone!
